original_text: So I spoke to you, and you would not listen; but you rebelled against the command of the Lord and presumptuously went up into the hill country.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 말하였으나 너희가 듣지 아니하고 여호와의 명령을 거역하고 거리낌 없이 산지로 올라가매

sentences.original_text: but you rebelled against the command of the Lord
and presumptuously went up into the hill country
